name: Heavy Will of Fate
description:
Embark on an epic quest to prevent the apocalypse, spanning three continents! Collect a multitude of weapons, spells and hats to aid you on your journey through a series of interactive puzzles and minigames.

Heavy Will of Fate aims to reimagine classic RPGs using modern RPG elements and mechanisms to create a unique experience that encompasses the best of both worlds. It has been a solo project of mine two years in the making, and is only 50% complete as of the date of this publication, so it is missing a few things, mainly music and sound in some areas. Also, Achievements are disabled for now, since they'll make more sense for the whole game, not just half.

In the future, I plan to add the following:

- More Weapons/Spells/Hats

- A continuation of the main story

- A full soundtrack

- Multiple Endings

- Controller support

- PvP Battles (This is a hard maybe, I've never done multiplayer, but I'll give it a shot if I have the time)

Thank you to all who play this early version, I look forward to reading your feedback!
